sub_title: Engineering Manager at eBay Ads | Developing top-notch promoted listing solutions
summary:
Software architect and Engineering leader in a wide variety of web-sites, e-commerce solutions and web-applications built with Node.js, Express.js and React.

Passionate and high skilled Full-stack Web Developer with more than 18 years of experience. 

Main areas of activities are:
* Frontend development using vanilla Javascript/Typescript, HTML5, CSS3 and React
* Backend development with Node.js and Express.js
* Web-applications high performance, scalability and optimisation.
* Web-applications security
* DevOps and Continuous Integration
* Test / Behavior Driven Development


Author of the articles and presentations about about web-development, Node.js, Drupal and Redis.

projects.title: node-mocks-http
projects.description: Mock 'http' objects for testing Express and Koa routing functions, but could be used for testing any Node.js web server applications that have code that requires mockups of the request and response objects.

projects.title: SiteStudio CMS
projects.description:
Development of our own CMS to manage the sites.
Back-office of site administrator has been implemented as a desktop-application for Windows and allows users to add and delete pages, post pages in WYSIWYG editor, manage users and so on
CMS easily expanded with additional modules, such as forms, files downloads, online store, blog and many others.
On the basis of this CMS have been developed and successfully employed more than 50 sites 

I participate in this project as a lead developer with team of 3 persons and carried out the following activities 
1. Program design and architecture 
2. Development of database structure 
3. Development server-side components on PHP and MySQL 
4. Development client-side application on Delphi and Interbase 

Technologies and languages used in this project: 
1. Delphi, Interbase 
2. PHP, MySQL 
3. HTML, CSS, Javascript 
4. XML

authors.headline: Engineering Manager at eBay Ads | Developing top-notch promoted listing solutions
Engineering Manager at eBay Ads | Developing top-notch promoted listing solutions

profile_positions.description: As a leader of a team of skilled engineers, I am dedicated to empowering eBay sellers to achieve even greater success by developing innovative and effective promoted listing solutions.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Manager / eBay Ads

profile_positions.description:
eBay Classifieds Group has merged with Adevinta as of June 25th 2021

Adevinta is an international family of local digital brands. We are a marketplace specialist and help local marketplaces around the world thrive through global connections and networks of knowledge.

Our local brands, including Marktplaats in the Netherlands, Leboncoin in France, mobile.de in Germany, InfoJobs in Spain, Subito in Italy, OLX in Brazil and Kijiji in Canada, have a total of 1.5 billion site visits and 250 million unique users each month. They form an integral part of life for users, support local communities and help shape a more sustainable future.
profile_positions.title: Frontend Architect / Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
Working with the cross-functional product teams on Martkplaats on creating new features for Marktplaats.nl website. 

As a tech leader of the team, I am responsible for designing and building highly resilient and scalable architecture for the frontend platform to support digital transformation projects, impacting millions of users.

My responsibilities also include developing frontend using Javascript, React and Polymer, developing backend-for-frontends and micro-services with NodeJS, creating  A/B tests and CI/CD pipelines.
profile_positions.title: Technical Lead / Senior Frontend Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Working on the next-generation of the biggest job boards in the Netherlands - nationalevacaturebank.nl and intermediair.nl, and on the Belgian sites: vacature.com and references.be.

* Developing web-applications using Drupal, Symfony framework and ElasticSearch.
* Front-end development using HTML5, SASS, vanilla JS, AngularJS and Bootstrap.
* BDD approach with 100% unit tests code coverage.
* Build web applications as microservices which run using Docker.  
* Fully automated delivery pipeline to continuously release new versions of the web applications. 
* Other technologies: Ansible, Jenkins, Mysql, RabbitMQ, ELK stack.
profile_positions.title: Senior Full-stack Web Developer

profile_positions.description:
* Developed REST API to integrate 3rd party games with Jaludo portals. Main technologies are Zend Framework and Redis.
* Implemented updates, fixes and new features for existing software.
* Implemented Unit testing and Continuous Integration workflow for projects to allow scale team, reduce stress and move faster.
* Maintained and optimised server/application infrastructure for high traffic websites (for example speeleiland.nl, brincar.pt, wyspagier.pl, mary.com).
profile_positions.title: Tech Lead

profile_positions.description:
* Developed e-commerce solutions, corporate portals, community-driven websites with Drupal CMF
* Created database and software architecture, functional design specifications, analysed design usability
* Front-end development using HTML5, vanilla JS and jQuery
* Performed requirements analysis and provided the long and short-term estimations
* Managed a team of 5 developers and QA-engineers
* Participated in the hiring process - analysed technical and soft skills of the candidates
* Trained and assisted new employees and junior/middle developers
* Represented the company in Ukrainian Drupal community
profile_positions.title: Tech Lead and Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Created, developed and maintained Kharkov.info - first open business catalog for Kharkov city.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder & Tech-lead

profile_positions.description: Created, developed and maintained Interesno.name - Kharkov news and entertainment portal
profile_positions.title: Owner & Tech-lead

profile_positions.description:
* Developed different web-sites and web-applications using Drupal CMF 6
* Designed databases and applications architecture.
* Created billing system for the advertisement service using ZendFramework, Doctrine and MySQL.
profile_positions.title: Senior Drupal and Zend Developer

profile_positions.description:
* Developed sites, e-commerce solutions with Drupal CMF and Ubercart.
* Developed web-office for real estate agencies with Drupal CMF
* Managed development department of 5 people
* Created technical specifications for the development and communication with customers
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder, Senior Drupal Developer

profile_positions.description:
* Developed sites using our own CMS. PHP + MySQL  for server side and Delphi + Interbase for client side
* Developed a custom CMS for online magazines and newspapers. PHP + MySQL  for server side and Delphi + Interbase for client side
* Created a program of inventory control and calculation programs for marketing for MLM companies. Using Delphi + Interbase
profile_positions.title: Software developer, Database administrator
